attributes.review: this app made my phone battery die. the app continues to run in the background of your phone without even being open, and my phone battery just shut off and i needed a new phone. it also whipped out my icloud storage, stole all of my personal information, and sold it on third party websites.
attributes.title: horrible. don’t waste your time

attributes.review: App is terrible. Doesn’t work. Useless. Waste of space. Full of glitches. Had to restart it 5 times to even get it to work.
attributes.title: Terrible🤢🤧

attributes.review: For some reason the app was being very touchy. It wouldn’t let me into the app, instead it kicked me out constantly. I was very unpleased with my experience.
attributes.title: Very unsatisfactory

attributes.review: I was recommended this app to tell me how to keep America great. It took three hours to download then wouldn’t even open😡. This is the worst app I have ever seen and has a Picture of a Cheeto on it.
attributes.title: BEWARE!!!!

attributes.review: This app is AWFUL! It wiped my entire phone!! Took all of my information from my phone and stole my credit card information too!! Unbelievable😤😤 almost all my money GONE! DO NOT TRUST!! 🥵🥶😤😤😰😰🤬🤬🤬😓😳🤯🤬🤬😤🧚🏽🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🥵🥵😱

attributes.review: I downloaded it in hopes of seeing a better part of America but as I opened it, it wasn’t so great and it definitely needs some improvements. And also don’t vote for trump!🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: THIS APP IS NOT IT!

attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE! when I downloaded this app, it was going smoothly until once I started reading something, a plane crashed in my house! I tried closing the app but it kept giving me viruses! DUMPTRUMP 2020
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: I got a notification saying this app was using my location while it was closed and I never allowed it to
attributes.title: Don’t download!!

attributes.review: This app is horribly glitchy! Barely functions and everytime I try to open it it crashes. Don’t even bother trying to use it. It’s useless
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It took eight freaking hours for this freaking app to load and when I finally went appI was so disappointed I didn’t learn anything!!!
attributes.title: Horrible
